result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

8:43 AM Defendant Amanda Marie Chavez appeared by phone.  Attorney Melissa Louise Barrette appeared by phone for Amanda Marie Chavez.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Defense requesting contact condition be amended to no violent/abusive contact. Victim has completed the ERD program. Victim makes a statement. State does not object to the modification. Court grants the defense motion to modify the bond condition as requested.

Addendum to Order - Br 3 Criminal Scheduling Order

Standard Conditions
Additional Conditions: 
No contact directly or indirectly with the party/parties named in the bail bond, no contact at their residence/property. 
Not to consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs or possess drug paraphernalia. 
Not possess controlled substances except for those medications specifically prescribed for him/her by a health care professional. 
Not to possess needles/syringes except with a valid prescription. 
Not to be on the premises of any tavern or business whose sole purpose is the sale of alcoholic beverages.

11:04 AM Prosecuting attorney Claudia T. Johnson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Amanda Marie Chavez in court.  Attorney Melissa Louise Barrette in court for Amanda Marie Chavez. Defendant advised of rights. Received complaint/waived reading. NG Plea entered. 950 Marcy's law complied with. Probable cause found in the complaint. Bond set.
